modVersion.name: Version
modVersion.hint: Currently installed module version (can't be changed here).

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

memberTokenNames1.name: Party #1 - List of members
memberTokenNames1.hint: Names of all tokens belonging to Party #1 (comma-separated).

partyTokenName1.hint: Name of the shared tokens of Party #1.

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the info text about this module in the chat window on game start (deactivate this option to see it again).

chatInfoContent.title: Crunch My Party!
chatInfoContent.text3: Please refer to the various module preferences under game settings. Find even more details on GitHub
chatInfoContent.footer: This chat card will only be shown once. Activate once more in the module settings if needed.

errMsg.invalidTokenCount: Required: Exactly ONE group and MORE THAN ONE members
errMsg.groupAndMembersIntersect: Names must not exist both as member and as group.
errMsg.maxNumberOfMemberTokens: Maximum number of 25 members per party exceeded.
errMsg.membersAndPartyBothVisible: Party members and party token can't be visible (active) at the same time.
errMsg.membersAndPartyAllHidden: None of the involved tokens are currently visible (active).
